text: Rotherham is a town in South Yorkshire, England. It lies on the River Don, close to its confluence with the River Rother, between Sheffield and Doncaster. Its football club, Rotherham United F.C., was founded in 1870. == Notable people == * Liam Cuckson * Lee Wilson * Quavo * Harry Low ==References== Category:Towns in South Yorkshire Category:Metropolitan boroughs in South Yorkshire
title: Rotherham
